name: CoroGuard
description:
CoroGuard

You are a Health Worker. You have been assigned  to distribute masks to virus infected and other people in your town. If you failed to give masks to virus infected. They will spread the virus. If there are no virus infectetd. you can give masks to other people in town. Those who wear mask will be safe from the virus. you can give masks to the same person you have given before but you won't get any score. You only have 5 masks. Give them carefully. Your score will be based on how many masks you have given to non infected. There is a map in your top right corner. You can move by A and D or Right Arrow and Left arrow keys. To give masks use left shift or ctrl keys. Your color will be blue, infected people will be in red color.
